channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 09:49 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 09:49 Air alert in Donetsk region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Донецка_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 09:03 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Myrivsk Territorial Community. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 09:03 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in the Myrivsk Territorial Community. Take shelter! #Мыривська_териториальна_громада This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
